advertisements.title: What a roaring success for the 10th Naragsakan Festival!
advertisements.description:
What a roaring success for the 10th Naragsakan Festival! We are incredibly proud of the adrenaline-pumping action at the 1st Mayor Donrio Martinez Motocross Competition
This epic event wouldn't have been possible without the strong support of our beloved Mayor, Hon. Riorita Martinez Castillo. Her commitment to promoting sports and community spirit truly drives Titay forward!ğŸ’
Thank you to all the riders, titayanons , and spectators who made this a day to remember!

advertisements.title: The Dasig Titay Scholarship Program
advertisements.description:
Ang edukasyon kay usa ka adbokasiya duol sa akong kasing-kasing
 These are the words heartily expressed by the Municipal Mayor of Titay, Hon. Riorita Martinez Castillo, as they officially launched the Dasig Titay Scholarship Program, an initiative that highlights the unwavering commitment of our Honorable Mayor and the Local Government Unit of Titay, to promote education and empower the future of our community.
The Dasig Titay Scholarship is designed to offer meaningful opportunities to deserving students, supporting them in reaching their academic goals. 
It stands as a symbol of our local leadersâ€™ dedication to nurturing progress and development in Titay.

advertisements.title: FLAG CEREMONY | First Monday of September
advertisements.description:
Today, we gathered once again for our traditional first Monday flag ceremony, honoring our nation and renewing our commitment to public service. ğŸ™Œ
The ceremony was graced by Municipal Mayor, Hon. Riorita Martinez Castillo, whose leadership and presence continue to uplift and guide our community. 
We are also honored by the presence of Former Mayor of Titay and Board Member, Hon. Maria Ezperanza Corazon Rillera Hadjula, whose continued support and dedication to our community inspire us all. ğŸ’š

newsArticles.title: ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS
TITAY MPS NEWS
newsArticles.summary:
At about 11:50 AM of September 10, 2025, personnel of Titay Municipal Police Station led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP, facilitated the voluntary deposited of one (1) unrenewed firearm described as:
One (1) unit caliber .45mm Taurus (PT145 PRO â€“ Serviceable) Pistol, with Serial Number: NEP97981, with one (1) magazine loaded with five (5) rounds of live ammunition of same caliber that expired on March 28, 2023.
The said firearm was deposited by one male individual, married, driver by occupation, and a resident of Barangay Poblacion Muslim, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The said firearm is now under the custody of Titay MPS for proper disposition.

newsArticles.title: PNP | Campaign Against Illegal Drugs
newsArticles.summary:
At about 9:00 AM of September 11, 2025, PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, COP, Titay MPS together with BDCP PNCO of this station, attended the Municipal Anti-Drug Abuse Council (MADAC) and Municipal Peace and Order Council (MPOC) Meeting. During the meeting, PMAJ ESPARES presented the Operational Accomplishments of Titay MPS particularly on the Focus Directives such as the Campaign Against Illegal Drugs, Arrest of Wanted Persons, and Loose Firearms. PMAJ ESPARES tackled strategies and goals for improving public safety and to enhance quality service to the community. PMAJ ESPARES also aims to build and maintain public trust through integrity, professionalism, and a strong connection with the community to ensure a safer and drug-free community.
#SaBagongPilipinasAngGustongPulisLigtasKa
#ToServeandProtect

Precautionary Measures for Tropical Depression (TD)

newsArticles.title: PNP | ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
newsArticles.summary:
ACCOMPLISHMENT ON ANTI-ILLEGAL DRUGS (Buy-bust) OPERATION:
At about 4:13 AM of September 9, 2025, MDET of Titay MPS led by PMAJ ARNOLD A ESPARES, ACOP conducted drug Buy-bust operation at Barangay San Antonio, Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay Province that resulted in the arrest of one male suspect and confiscation of the following items:
a. Five (5) pcs small heat-sealed transparent plastic sachets containing white crystalline substance suspected to be shabu with an estimated weight of 1 gram with SDP of Php 6,800.00; 
b. One (1) unit android mobile phone model Realme with cellphone case,color violet ( used as container )
c. One (1) pc Five-Hundred-peso bill (Marked Money) with serial number AE4241391.
Confiscated drug evidence was brought to Zamboanga Sibugay Provincial Forensic Unit for Qualitative and Quantitative examination, while the suspect was brought to Titay MPS for proper disposition and appropriate filing of case thru inquest proceeding.

newsArticles.title: BFP | ğˆğğ•ğ„ğğ“ğğ‘ğ˜ ğğ… ğğ„ğ‘ğ’ğğğğ„ğ‹, ğğ‘ğğğ„ğ‘ğ“ğ˜ ğ€ğğƒ ğ„ğğ”ğˆğğŒğ„ğğ“ ğŸğŸğŸğŸ“
newsArticles.summary:
The Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP)  Annual Inventory Team 2025, composed of Commissioned and Non-Commissioned Officers from the BFP Regional Office IX in coordination with Representatives from the Commission on Audit, conducted a comprehensive inventory of personnel, property, and equipment at Titay Municipal Fire Station, Poblacion Titay, Zamboanga Sibugay.
The annual inventory of personnel, property, and equipment in the Bureau of Fire Protection (BFP) Region IX ensures accountability and compliance with Commission on Audit (COA) guidelines. It verifies the proper recording, condition, and completeness of government-issued assets, including uniforms and equipment, while identifying shortages or damages for timely action. This process promotes transparency, efficiency, and operational readiness across the organization
